alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 10:29AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BULLOCK AND SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 1028 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Sellers, or 11 miles west of Meadville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Pike Road, Pine Level, Strata, Dublin, Naftel, Sprague, Shopton, Grady, Sellers, Davenport, Ramer, Lapine, Carters Hill, Currys and Cecil. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
